name: proworks-recommend-batch
description: ProWorks 推薦バッチ処理 Lambda関数

scripts.prepare-build: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && cp -r dist/* build/ && cp package.json build/ && cp package-lock.json build/ 2>/dev/null || true && cd build && npm install --omit=dev
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run prepare-build && sam build
scripts.local:get-jobs: npm run build && sam local invoke GetJobsFunction --env-vars env.json
scripts.local:process-job: npm run build && sam local invoke ProcessJobFunction --env-vars env.json -e events/process-job.json
